snippet.title: Time Flipper Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
**Time Flipper** is an adventure / exploration game set in a hidden dimension, similar to Earth. 

With the time-flip device, you can switch between two world states: the past and the future. This powerful tool will help you navigate the world, find hidden passages, items, and find the missing, those who have been abducted by alien entities. Free them and they’ll help you escape. Be careful though, there will be resistance.

Discover the truth behind the abductions and what they mean for humanity. The superb dynamic soundtrack changes depending on the state of the world.

Demo coming soon

Wish-list on Steam https://store.steampowered.com/app/1807950/Time_Flipper/
